content: Install required frontend dependencies (lucide-react, framer-motion, sonner, date-fns, @tiptap/react, @tiptap/starter-kit, react-dropzone)
Create comprehensive MVP application with backend (gateway client, scheduler, CRUD endpoints, upload handling) and frontend (UI components, dashboard with tabs, schedule form, editor, history table)
Test gateway with text message to test phone (6281290080025)
Test gateway with image message to test phone
Test end-to-end scheduling and sending functionality
